lead_paragraph: Mark Stone scored 4:22 into overtime to lift the Ottawa Senators to a 2-1 win over the Boston Bruins on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Stone Scores in OT to Lift Senators to 2-1 Win Over Bruins
headline.main: Stone Scores in OT to Lift Senators to 2-1 Win Over Bruins
